title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 7.11 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 7.11 - Penalties

State Regulations

Failure to meet Department of Motor Vehicles and/or

Education Department standards, including misuse of certificates, may result in
a temporary or permanent withdrawal of school and/or instructor approval and/or
removal of all course completion certificates (MV-278). If, within 10 days of
the imposition of such penalty, the commissioner receives a written request for
a hearing from the school or instructor involved, the commissioner shall cause
a hearing to be held. If such request for a hearing be made, the penalty shall
be stayed pending completion of the hearing. If certification is withdrawn, training may be required as a prerequisite for
recertification. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
7.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
